name: MailPipe
tagline: An opensource email to REST api project
body:
### Goals
Create a stand alone mailserver to receive emails (port 25) and a webserver
Get notifications pushed to a callback url when an email matching your route is received.
Enable the creation and deletion of routes via an api.

### Installation

```
$ git clone git://github.com/readevalprint/mailpipe-project.git
cd ./mailpipe-project
```

### Setup
TODO: explain how to run the webserver and mailserver

### Usage

* Create a user
* Log in as that user
* Create a route and callback url
* Email that route(+(*.))?@YOUR_HOST
* Handle the callback on your server and request the corresponding email id
